sentences.sContent: The plant needs some water – it’s starting to droop.
sentences.sCn: 这株植物需要浇些水——它开始打蔫了。

sentences.sContent: His eyelids began to droop (= close, because he was sleepy ) .
sentences.sCn: 他的眼皮开始耷拉下来了。

words.tran: 下垂；弯曲；发蔫（droop的现在分词）

trans.tranCn: 低垂, 凋萎, 萎靡
trans.tranOther: to hang or bend down, or to make something do this
